meanings.definition: Flavanones are a type of flavonoid compound found in plants.
meanings.sent2: The flavanones in plants help with growth and protection.
meanings.sent3: The little flavanones in the garden were always chatting about their plant adventures.
meanings.sent4: The flavanones stood out in the plant world like colorful gems in a sea of green.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the intricate structure of flavanones was revealed.

meanings.definition: Flavanones are known for their antioxidant properties.
meanings.sent1: Eating citrus fruits can boost your intake of flavanones.
meanings.sent2: The antioxidant power of flavanones helps fight off harmful molecules.
meanings.sent3: The flavanones threw a party to celebrate their antioxidant abilities.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against free radicals, flavanones were the fearless warriors.
meanings.sent5: The health benefits of flavanones are widely recognized in the medical community.

meanings.definition: Flavanones are commonly found in citrus fruits.
meanings.sent1: Oranges and lemons are rich sources of flavanones.
meanings.sent2: Citrus fruits like grapefruits are packed with flavanones.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous flavanones in the orange played hide-and-seek with the other nutrients.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fruits, flavanones were the shining stars of the citrus group.
meanings.sent5: The refreshing taste of citrus fruits comes from the presence of flavanones.
